roleset.name: clean a surface of liquid, with a mop or mopping implement
roleset.note: MOP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mop' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from mop.01-v predicate notes)
MOPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from mopping.01-n)

example.name: mop-v: automatically generated
example.text: Never once did she gasp for air or mop her brow .

example.name: mop-v: with mop
example.text: John mopped the floor with Mary's expensive silk dress.

roleset.name: clean up with a mop
roleset.note: MOP_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: mop_up-v
example.text: Meanwhile [small communities in Western Australia 's Pilbara region]-1 began *PRO*-1 mopping up on Wednesday after tropical Cyclone Laurence swept through , flattening buildings and uprooting trees .
example.arg: after tropical Cyclone Laurence swept through , flattening buildings and uprooting trees
